1. Two ways protists (Protista) can be organised are by their modes of nutrition and locomotion. Name one mode of nutrition and one mode of locomotion found in this group. **(2 pt)** \vspace{1cm}  
 
2. What taxonomic level (Domain - Kingdom - Phylum/Group) do the following names belong to? **(3 pt)**  
    a. Archaea ____________  
    b. Protista ____________  
    c. Diatoms ____________  
    d. Eukarya ____________  
    e. Ciliates ____________  
    f. Radiolarians ____________  

3. What do animals and fungi have in common? (Hint: recall the systematic tree for Kingdoms.) **(1 pt)** \linebreak \linebreak

    a. What is the total magnification of the microscope? ________ **(1 pt)**
